text.title: DLCL Structure
text.more: This graph shows connections among DLCL faculty based on departmental and other affiliations. Color indicates membership in a group of similar nodes. The size of a node indicates how many connections it has. You can zoom in to see labels, hover over a node, or search for a name in the search box. Clicking on a node will display only that node's immediate connections.
text.intro: This graph shows the structure of the DLCL by faculty affiliation.
